entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
